00028 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00029 {
00030   createinfo(argc, argv);
00031 
00032   /* enough arguments ? */
00033 
00034   if (argc < 4) {
00035     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] PROJPARA [SYMMETRY:]MBSTATE [SYMMETRY:]MBSTATE\n"
00036             "\n   -o OMEGA       Oscillator constant [MeV]"
00037             "\n   -n NMAX        up to NMAX excitations"
00038             "\n   -N NINT        use NINT points for theta integration"
00039             "\n   -a             show also proton and neutron occupations"
00040             "\n   -A             show all eigenstates\n", argv[0]);
00041     exit(-1);
00042   }
00043 
00044   int all=0;
00045   int hermit=0;
00046   int totalonly=1;
00047 
00048   double omega=0.0;
00049   int nmax = 10;
00050   int nint;
00051 
00052   char c;
00053 
00054   /* manage command-line options */
00055 
00056   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "Aao:n:N:")) != -1)
00057     switch (c) {
00058     case 'a':
00059       totalonly = 0;
00060       break;
00061     case 'o':
00062       omega = atof(optarg)/hbc;
00063       break;
00064     case 'n':
00065       nmax = atoi(optarg);
00066       break;
00067     case 'N':
00068       nint = atoi(optarg);
00069       break;
00070     case 'A':
00071       all=1;
00072       break;
00073     }
00074 
00075   char* projpar = argv[optind];
00076   char** mbfile = &argv[optind+1];
00077 
00078   SlaterDet Q[2];
00079   Symmetry S[2];
00080 
00081   int i;
00082   for (i=0; i<2; i++) {
00083     extractSymmetryfromString(&mbfile[i], &S[i]);
00084     if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q[i], mbfile[i]))
00085       goto cleanup;
00086   }
00087 
00088   // odd numer of nucleons ?
00089   int odd = Q[0].A % 2;
00090 
00091   // Projection parameters
00092   Projection P;
00093   initProjection(&P, odd, projpar);
00094 
00095 
00096   ShellOccupationsPara par = {
00097     omega : omega,
00098     nmax  : nmax,
00099     nint  : nint
00100   };
00101 
00102   initOpShellOccupations(&par);
00103 
00104   void* occupationsme; 
00105 
00106   occupationsme = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpShellOccupations);
00107 
00108   // read or calculate matrix element
00109   if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfile[0], mbfile[1], &P, 
00110                                 &OpShellOccupations, S[0], S[1], 
00111                                 occupationsme)) {

00113                       S[0], S[1], occupationsme);
00114     writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbfile[0], mbfile[1], &P, 
00115                              &OpShellOccupations, S[0], S[1], 
00116                              occupationsme);
00117   }
